servers.name: com.knitli/codeweaver
servers.description: Semantic code search built for AI agents. Hybrid, AST-aware, context for 166 languages.

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify a custom config file path for CodeWeaver. Only needed if not using the default locations.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_CONFIG_FILE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Enable debug mode for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_DEBUG

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the API key for the embedding provider, if required. Note: {', '.join([p for p in _providers_for_kind('embedding') if p.])}
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_API_KEY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the embedding model to use.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_MODEL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the embedding provider to use.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_PROVIDER

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Set the server host for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_HOST

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Set the log level for CodeWeaver (e.g., DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR).
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Set the MCP server port for CodeWeaver if using http transport for mcp. Not required if using the default port (9328), or stdio transport.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_MCP_PORT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Set the port for the codeweaver management server (information and management endpoints).
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_PORT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Use a premade provider settings profile for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_PROFILE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Set the project name for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_PROJECT_NAME

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Set the project path for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_PROJECT_PATH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the API key for the reranking provider, if required.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_API_KEY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the reranking model to use.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_MODEL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the reranking provider to use.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_PROVIDER

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the sparse embedding model to use.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_SPARSE_EMBEDDING_MODEL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the sparse embedding provider to use.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_SPARSE_EMBEDDING_PROVIDER

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the API key for the vector store, if required.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_API_KEY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the port for the vector store.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_PORT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the vector store provider to use.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_PROVIDER

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Specify the URL for the vector store.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_URL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Disable telemetry data collection.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER__TELEMETRY__DISABLE_TELEMETRY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Opt-in to potentially identifying collection of query and search result data. This is invaluable for helping us improve CodeWeaver's search capabilities. If privacy is a higher priority, do not enable this setting.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CODEWEAVER__TELEMETRY__TOOLS_OVER_PRIVACY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: HTTP proxy for requests (Used by: Azure, Azure, Voyage)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: HTTPS_PROXY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: API key for OpenAI-compatible services (not necessarily an API key *for* OpenAI). environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: One of: 'debug', 'info', 'warning', 'error' (Used by: Azure, Cerebras, Deepseek, Fireworks, Github, Groq, Heroku, Moonshot, Ollama, Openai, Openrouter, Perplexity, Together, Vercel, X Ai)

servers.name: io.github.Couchbase-Ecosystem/mcp-server-couchbase
servers.description: Couchbase Model Context Protocol Server to interact with Couchbase clusters

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Couchbase connection string. Required for connecting to the cluster.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_CONNECTION_STRING

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Couchbase database username. Required for basic authentication.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_USERNAME

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Couchbase database password. Required for basic authentication.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_PASSWORD

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Couchbase CA certificate path. Required for TLS authentication in non Capella clusters.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_CA_CERT_PATH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Couchbase client certificate path. Required for mTLS authentication.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_CLIENT_CERT_PATH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Couchbase client key path. Required for mTLS authentication.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_CLIENT_KEY_PATH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Couchbase read only query mode. Set to true to allow only read-only queries. Set to false to allow data modification queries.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_MCP_READ_ONLY_QUERY_MODE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Transport mode for the server (stdio, http or sse). Default is stdio
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_MCP_TRANSPORT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Host to run the MCP server on (default: 127.0.0.1). Used only for HTTP and SSE transport modes.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_MCP_HOST

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Port to run the MCP server on (default: 8000). Used only for HTTP and SSE transport modes.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CB_MCP_PORT

servers.name: io.github.schemacrawler/schemacrawler-ai
servers.description: Enables natural language schema queries â€” explore tables, keys, procedures, and get SQL help fast

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database user name. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_USER

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database user password. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_PASSWORD

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: JDBC URL for database connection. If this is provided, the server, host, port and database are not used.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_JDBC_URL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: SchemaCrawler database plugin, for example, 'sqlserver' or 'sqlite'. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_SERVER

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database host. Defaults to localhost. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_HOST

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database port. Defaults to the default port for the server type. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_PORT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database to connect to (optional). Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: How much database metadata to retrieve. Values are 'minimum', 'standard', 'detailed' or 'maximum'.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_INFO_LEVEL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Logging verbosity level. Values are 'SEVERE', 'WARNING', 'INFO', 'CONFIG', or 'FINE'.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_LOG_LEVEL
